name: Rabbiton-Hometown
description:
The project is my final project for my studies.
For the project, I had 3 months' time (including planning, writing the thesis and printing).
It's the beginning of a city-builder-survival game. Due to lack of time and preparations for moving to Sweden, it has some bugs and just short gameplay.

Like in all my games, I created everything (programming, art) by myself.

Features:
- selectable and controllable citizens with needs to care about (hunger, thirst, sleep)
- resources: 6 implemented resources
- 6 different structures to build
- event: the mighty rabbit god wants a sacrifice (goods) once in a month
